ModMetaData.name: Deep Orbit
ModMetaData.author: Broms
ModMetaData.description: This adds a secondary deeper orbit layer with rich asteroids, filled with danger. This secondary layer is twice the height of the default Orbit layer and has roughly 8 rich asteroids filled with resources, a loot stash, and an insectoid cave. These asteroids are finite and cannot be regenerated, nor will quests appear in deep orbit.
